MIA (Modular Image Analysis)

Modular, object-based analysis for ImageJ/Fiji

View on GitHub
Introduction Getting started Modules List of modules Macros Extending MIA
Back to module list

Register images

Description

Uses SIFT image registration toolbox

Parameters

  • Input image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Apply to input image
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Output image
    • Type: OutputImageP
  • Alignment mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Automatic (feature extraction)
    • Choices:
      • Automatic (feature extraction)
      • Manual (landmarks)
  • Relative mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: First frame
    • Choices:
      • First frame
      • Previous frame
      • Specific image
  • Rolling correction
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: None
    • Choices:
      • None
      • Every nth frame
  • Correction interval
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 1
  • Reference image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Calculation source
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Internal
    • Choices:
      • Internal
      • External
  • External source
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Calculation channel
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 1
  • Transformation mode
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Rigid
    • Choices:
      • Affine
      • Rigid
      • Similarity
      • Translation
  • Initial Gaussian blur (px)
    • Type: DoubleP
    • Default value: 1.6
  • Steps per scale
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 3
  • Minimum image size (px)
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 64
  • Maximum image size (px)
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 1024
  • Feature descriptor size
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 4
  • Feature descriptor orientation bins
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 8
  • Closest/next closest ratio
    • Type: DoubleP
    • Default value: 0.92
  • Maximal alignment error (px)
    • Type: DoubleP
    • Default value: 25.0
  • Inlier ratio
    • Type: DoubleP
    • Default value: 0.05
  • Enable multithreading
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
ModularImageAnalysis is maintained by SJCross. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
